name: Lefay Resort & Spa Lago di Garda

reviews.text: We stayed here for a week in August. It is a great hotel in one of the most stunning settings, the views were breathtaking. I cannot fault much about this hotel. The rooms and facilities were spotless and of great quality. The food was excellent (with a kids menu too). We found service in the restaurant good, not perfect, but when is it ever perfect? The staff were very friendly, in fact it felt quite a family atmosphere after a few days. The staff were also very helpful when we had a few problems.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have no complaints but would warn anyone intending to stay there of 2 things:
reviews.title: Good, but not perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. There is little control over the air con (you can change it by + or - 3 degrees). On our first night we could not get the room cool enough and had to open the windows which led to a disturbed night from external noises. However once we mentioned this to reception they turned down the thermostat in our rooms and we were fine after that. So if you find the room too hot (or cold) just ask.
reviews.title: Nice but could be better!
Some comments seem to me exaggerated
reviews.text: 2. We had looked forward to enjoying the stunning views during dinner but alas there are just a dozen tables with window views and it seemed almost impossible to get one. We did manage it but I think the best plan would be to request this before your arrival if it is important to you.

reviews.title: Amazing view and superb facilities
reviews.text: Overall, fantastic and we will return.

reviews.title: Relaxing paradise with incredible food and the ultimate in service!
reviews.text: Please don't expect to spend to much time out of the resort as it's very secluded, but to be honest we never found the need to leave.

aka: Lefay Resort And Spa Lago Di Garda Hotel
description: Lefay Resort & SPA Lago di Garda is located in Gargnano, one of the mostpicturesque villages on Lake Garda. The Resort is situated inside an 11 hectaresnatural park in the heart of the spectacular and renown Riviera dei Limoni,surrounded by gentle hills and natural terraces rich in olive trees and woodsoverlooking the lake.
